transcript: and there's this quote from one of my friends Alex homozy that says you don't become Confident by shouting affirmations in the mirror but by having a stack of undeniable proof that you are who you say you are outwork yourself doubt a lot of people are like no but what if you don't have any successes like how do you get started they don't realize the validity of the smaller things that they have done up to that point did you get dressed this morning did you get in front of the computer it's smaller evidence but you have enough evidence to make the claim that you can do this you do that enough times that you have enough evidence to make a claim that you can do this and support it but that's the idea is just stacking as many of those pieces of evidence that give you proof that you are who you say you are
